snippet: A European Commission move to penalize companies that fail to meet a 40 percent goal for female membership was called an unwarranted interference in national plans.
abstract: Britain says European Commission move to penalize companies that fail to meet a 40 percent goal for female board membership is an unwarranted interference in national plans to enhance diversity.
lead_paragraph: A European Commission move to penalize companies that fail to meet a 40 percent goal for female membership was called an unwarranted interference in national plans.

headline.seo: Britain Objects to Quotas for Women on Boards
headline.main: Britain Objects to Quota for Women on Boards
headline.print_headline: Britain Opposes Quotas For Women on Boards
